name: MLTrainingSessionParameters
desc: The configuration settings for a training session.

items.name: init(sessionDirectory: URL?, reportInterval: Int, checkpointInterval: Int, iterations: Int)
items.desc: Creates a set of parameters for a training session.

items.name: let sessionDirectory: URL?
items.desc: The location in the file system where the session stores its progress.

items.name: var reportInterval: Int
items.desc: The number of iterations the session completes before it reports its progress.

items.name: var checkpointInterval: Int
items.desc: The number of iterations the session completes before it saves a checkpoint.

items.name: var iterations: Int
items.desc: The total number of iterations for the session.
